title: Jack the dog loses the plot every time his owner turns on the windscreen wipers
text:
A dog was caught on camera frantically barking at windscreen wipers in a car as his owner tried to hold him back.

The pooch, called Jack, was in the car in Lewisville, Texas, when the wiper blades were switched on by the driver.

In the clip, taken on October 9, Jack can't contain himself and lunged straight for the window.

Jack the dog frantically barks at the windscreen wipers from the passenger seat of a car in Lewisville, Texas

The video starts with the driver asking the person behind the camera if they were ready to film as the unassuming dog looks on from the front seat.

When the wipers are turned on, Jack - sat on one of his owner's laps - quickly spots them and lunges forward as if to attack.

He tries to get up onto the dashboard, but is held back by the passenger as he furiously barks.

His owners can be heard laughing in the background.

When the windshield wipers come to a brief stop, Jack continues to growl as a voice can be heard saying: 'Look at his face!'

He dries to get up onto the dash board, but is held back by the passenger as he furiously barks

But as they start up again, Jack continues with his aggressive barking fit.

He tracks the blades with his eyes as they move across the windshield.

The pooch's owner said Jack came along for a ride with their daughter.

They said: 'We were taking our daughter to college. She wanted to take our dog, Jack with us.

'As we started driving we needed to clean the windshield. The wipers made Jack go crazy!'
description: The video, taken in Lewisville, Texas, shows Jack on his owner's lap on the passenger-side of the car. When the driver switches the wiper blades on, Jack lunges for the window.
